controllers

Class ClientHomeC

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.ClientHomeC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MainInstanceInterface, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ClientHomeC
extends java.lang.Object
implements MainInstanceInterface, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    this is a controller for ClientHomeSale gui. the home form is the first form we see when we login as a client. in this form we just have a single button "check special offer" that checks discounts for the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientHomeC() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkGasStation(java.lang.String gasStationString)
      checkGasStation get a gas station name and return true or false
      boolean checkSpecialOffer()
      checkSpecialOffer finds out what are the gas stations that the user has in its subscription. then it checks if there exists an offers for those gas stations.
      void initialize(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
      initialize : the function is responsible to display the home picture and the single button to the user.
      void setMainInstance(ConnectToInstance main_instance)
      setMainInstance : this is the function from the MainInstanceInterface interface here we handle opening internal forms from another controller (another window)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • ClientHomeC

        public ClientHomeC()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        initialize : the function is responsible to display the home picture and the single button to the user. if there are no discounts for the client - the special offer button will be disabled to the user
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • checkSpecialOffer

        public boolean checkSpecialOffer()
        checkSpecialOffer finds out what are the gas stations that the user has in its subscription. then it checks if there exists an offers for those gas stations. if we have discounts - it counts how many and returns true else returns false
        Returns:
        boolean - true if there are discounts and false otherwise

      • checkGasStation

        public boolean checkGasStation(java.lang.String gasStationString)
        checkGasStation get a gas station name and return true or false
        Parameters:
        gasStationString - - the gas station name
        Returns:
        boolean - true if gas station is one of ours and else otherwise

      • setMainInstance

        public void setMainInstance(ConnectToInstance main_instance)
        setMainInstance : this is the function from the MainInstanceInterface interface here we handle opening internal forms from another controller (another window)
        Specified by:
        setMainInstance in interface MainInstanceInterface
        Parameters:
        main_instance - - the instance of the main controller in which we want to use
